title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Online Social Education Design and Rubric-Based Assessment Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can integrate various instructional tools and approaches when designing online education modules

Learners can develop blended learning modules through collaboration and content sharing in digital environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
